entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Killarney
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:13 p.m. EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers early this evening then partly cloudy. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning in the morning. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Wind becoming northwest 20 late in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle. Amount 5 mm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 overnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. High 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 21 April 2023
